sentences.en: A hero with no place to display his prowess.
sentences.cn: 英雄无用武之地.

sentences.en: And above all, we must stop disparaging digital prowess just because some of us over 40 don't happen to possess it.
sentences.cn: 最关键的是，我们不能仅仅因为一些40岁以上的人没能掌握数码科技，就贬低数码科技的威力。

sentences.en: But China's market clout is not matched by its governance prowess.
sentences.cn: 但是,中国对市场的影响,与其治理能力并不相符.

sentences.en: He was famous for his prowess as an athlete.
sentences.cn: 他作为一名运动员以技艺高超而著称.

sentences.en: He's always bragging about his prowess as a cricketer.
sentences.cn: 他总是吹嘘自己板球水平高超。

sentences.en: He's always bragging about his prowess as a hunter.
sentences.cn: 他老是吹嘘自己作为猎手的高超技能。

sentences.en: his physical prowess
sentences.cn: 他优异的体能

sentences.en: Hurry had a respectable reputation for prowess among his associates.
sentences.cn: 赫利在和他相识的人中,素有勇敢豪侠的名声.

sentences.en: It is a test of human spirit as much as physical prowess.
sentences.cn: 它既是身手的检验,又是人类意志的检验.

sentences.en: military prowess
sentences.cn: 精良的军事技能

sentences.en: Simon's always talking big about his prowess on the golf course.
sentences.cn: 西蒙总是吹嘘自己在高尔夫球场上的杰出才能.

sentences.en: Some analysts express caution against overstating China's naval prowess.
sentences.cn: 一些分析人士对夸大中国海军实力的说法发出警告.

sentences.en: Take BASF , a German chemicals giant renowned for its pricing prowess.
sentences.cn: 德国化学巨头巴斯夫以善于定价著称.

sentences.en: The best and the brightest pupils competed to demonstrate their intellectual prowess.
sentences.cn: 最出色、最聪明的学生们竞相展示他们的才智。

sentences.en: The soldiers song of victory , describing their prowess in battle.
sentences.cn: 士兵们在战斗中受挫,不得不撤退.

sentences.en: The tribesmen sang a song of victory, describing their prowess in battle.
sentences.cn: 部落的男子们唱起胜利之歌, 歌颂他们战斗中的英勇.

sentences.en: The young student from the theatrical school showed great prowess at acting in the play.
sentences.cn: 这个戏剧学校的学生在这出戏中显示出了非凡的演技.

sentences.en: This magnificent work of engineering prowess sports a Martini racing fascia.
sentences.cn: 这一宏伟工程的工作能力体育1马提尼赛车筋膜.

sentences.en: We had to admire his prowess as an oarsman / his rowing prowess.
sentences.cn: 我们不能不佩服他那了不起的划桨本领.

sentences.en: With its prowess, Hezbollah can now blackmail the government into giving it more political power.
sentences.cn: 真主党展示了自己的威力，如今可以勒索政府赋予它更多的政权。
